meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> can <radical>see</radical> the <kanji>present time</kanji> for what it really is. The future isn't important. The past isn't important. The present is when everything <kanji>appear</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: At the <kanji>present time</kanji> the king is <reading>Gen</reading>ji (げん). The time has finally come for him to get serious, and as they say, there's no time like the present.
